com.yahoo.bullet.common

Interface Monoidal

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Closable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Strategy
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdditiveTumbling, Basic, FrequentItemsSketchingStrategy, GroupAllStrategy, QuantileSketchingStrategy, Querier, RawStrategy, Scheme, SketchingStrategy, SlidingRecord, ThetaSketchingStrategy, Tumbling, TupleSketchingStrategy

    public interface Monoidal
extends Closable
    This interface captures the associative operations that can be performed within Bullet. The identity is this object when initially constructed or when reset(). This is a special case of a Monoid that works on BulletRecord and allows you to collapse chained combinations of them with combine(byte[]) or merge(Monoidal). You can extract the data using getData() to use with combine(byte[]) or as results to present to the work with getResult() or getRecords() or getMetadata(). Note that getMetadata() might not be strictly monoidal since they may not reset to the identity upon reset().

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void combine(byte[] data)
      Combines a serialized piece of data into this Monoid.
      void consume(com.yahoo.bullet.record.BulletRecord data)
      Consumes a single BulletRecord into this Monoid.
      byte[] getData()
      Get the data serialized as a byte[].
      Meta getMetadata()
      Get the metadata only of the data so far.
      List<com.yahoo.bullet.record.BulletRecord> getRecords()
      Get the data so far as a List of BulletRecord.
      Clip getResult()
      Get the data so far as a Clip.
      default void merge(Monoidal other)
      Combine the data from another instance of the same type of object into this Monoid.
      void reset()
      Reset the data so far and make this the identity element for the Monoid with respect to inserting data.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.yahoo.bullet.common.Closable

        isClosed

    • Method Detail

      • consume

        void consume(com.yahoo.bullet.record.BulletRecord data)
        Consumes a single BulletRecord into this Monoid.
        Parameters:
        data - The BulletRecord to consume.

      • combine

        void combine(byte[] data)
        Combines a serialized piece of data into this Monoid.
        Parameters:
        data - A serialized representation of the data produced by getData().

      • merge

        default void merge(Monoidal other)
        Combine the data from another instance of the same type of object into this Monoid. By default, just unconditionally calls the getData() method on the object and passes it to combine(byte[]).
        Parameters:
        other - The non-null other object to combine data from.

      • getData

        byte[] getData()
        Get the data serialized as a byte[].
        Returns:
        the serialized representation of the data so far.

      • getResult

        Clip getResult()
        Get the data so far as a Clip.
        Returns:
        The resulting Clip representing the data and the metadata so far.

      • getRecords

        List<com.yahoo.bullet.record.BulletRecord> getRecords()
        Get the data so far as a List of BulletRecord.
        Returns:
        The resulting list of records representing the data.

      • getMetadata

        Meta getMetadata()
        Get the metadata only of the data so far. Might not be reset().
        Returns:
        The Meta collected so far.

      • reset

        void reset()
        Reset the data so far and make this the identity element for the Monoid with respect to inserting data.
